Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Every day I'm grateful,
For a love like you.

In your arms I found my home,
In your heart I found my peace,
With you beside me always,
My joy will never cease.

Your laughter is my favorite song,
Your smile my guiding light,
With you the days are beautiful,
And magical each night.

Through storms and sunshine we have grown,
Together hand in hand,
Our love a journey shared with joy,
More than I could have planned.
